nodes.description: black teapot with a curved spout and an ornate lid

graphs.instruction: First, take the teapot from the kitchen and put it on the couch in the living room. Then move it to the table in the bedroom. The teapot is black with a curved spout and an ornate lid. This teapot is a gift from my grandfather.

nodes.description: gray laptop with a black keyboard and touchpad, black laptop stand with a rounded design

graphs.instruction: Move the laptop and laptop stand from the living room table to the bedroom chair. Also, bring a book from the bedroom chair to the living room table. The laptop is gray with a black keyboard and touchpad, the laptop stand is black with a rounded design, and the book is a green sketchbook with a spiral binding and brown central design. The laptop and the laptop stand are essential for my work setup.

nodes.description: white vase with a faceted design

graphs.instruction: Place the vase on the shelves, the candle on the table? The vase is white with a faceted design, and the candle is mint green with white butterfly designs. The vase is a family heirloom.

nodes.alias: gift toy airplane from childhood friend
nodes.description: red toy airplane, part of the Air Hogs Wind Flyers Set

nodes.name: toy airplane
attributes: part of the Air Hogs Wind Flyers Set

graphs.instruction: Move the toy airplane from the bedroom to the living room table. Place it next to the couch. The toy airplane is red, part of the Air Hogs Wind Flyers Set. It's a gift from my childhood friend.

nodes.description: dark green analog alarm clock with twin bells

graphs.instruction: Move the picture frame and clock to the table in the bedroom. Then, place them next to each other on the counter in the kitchen. The picture frame is black with teardrop-shaped embellishments, and the clock is a dark green analog alarm clock with twin bells. The clock was a gift from my grandfather.

nodes.description: round, dark brown loaf with slashes on top

graphs.instruction: Place the bread, the potato, and the egg on the kitchen table and place them next to each other. The bread is a round, dark brown loaf with slashes on top, the potato is brown with a smooth surface, and the egg is brown with a smooth surface. The bread is from my favorite bakery.

nodes.description: tall cylindrical candle with a lavender color

graphs.instruction: First, move the candle and then the vase from the living room shelves to the bathroom toilet. Place them next to each other on the toilet. The candle is tall and cylindrical with a lavender color, and the vase is dark blue with a faceted design. The candle is my favorite for relaxation.

nodes.description: black laptop with a dark keyboard and a large touchpad

graphs.instruction: Move the laptop and the mouse pad to a new living room table. Move the clock to another shelf. The laptop is black with a dark keyboard and a large touchpad, and the mouse pad is black with a logo in the corner. The clock is red with a white face and black numbers. The laptop is essential for my work.

nodes.description: black rugged laptop with a gray touchpad and black mouse pad with a logo in the corner

graphs.instruction: Move the laptop and mouse pad from the table in the bedroom to the counter in the kitchen. Place them next to each other on the counter. The laptop is black and rugged with a gray touchpad, and the mouse pad is black with a logo in the corner. The laptop and mouse pad are part of my work setup.

nodes.description: multicolored hardcover book with a geometric design

graphs.instruction: Organize the bedroom. Put the vase, book, and clock on the chest of drawers. The vase is white with a beige geometric pattern, the book is a multicolored hardcover with a geometric design, and the clock is maroon with a green digital display. The book is a gift from my best friend.

nodes.description: black and white Android_Figure_Panda

graphs.instruction: Move the android figure to a new living room table. Also, move the action figure to a new living room table. The android figure is a black and white Android_Figure_Panda, and the action figure is a green and blue Leonardo from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Android figure is a collectible item.

nodes.description: blue clock with rabbit ears and feet

graphs.instruction: Move the book and clock from the living room shelves to the bedroom chair. Place them next to each other on the chair. The book has a dark cover featuring a portrait with teal text, and the clock is blue with rabbit ears and feet. The clock is a gift from my brother.

nodes.description: pink pencil case with large white dots

graphs.instruction: Take the book, pencil case, and multiport hub from the table in the living room and put them on the shelves in the bedroom, placing them next to each other. The book is a hardcover with a colorful cover design, the pencil case is pink with large white dots called Big Dot Pink Pencil Case, and the multiport hub is gray with multiple USB ports. The pencil case is my favorite.

nodes.description: dark blue cup with a dandelion design and plain white plate with a smooth, circular design

graphs.instruction: Move the jug, cup, and plate to the living room table. The jug is dark green with a rounded base, the cup is dark blue with a dandelion design, and the plate is plain white with a smooth, circular design. The cup and the plate are part of my favorite set.

nodes.description: black and orange keychain with a circular pendant

graphs.instruction: Move the kettle and keychain from the kitchen cabinet to the bedroom filing cabinet. Place them next to each other on the filing cabinet. The kettle is black with a silver handle, and the keychain is black and orange with a circular pendant. The keychain is a souvenir from my trip to Japan.

nodes.description: neatly arrange vase, book, and clock on the chest of drawers for a tidy look

nodes.name: chest_of_drawers
nodes.expression: on the chest of drawers in the bedroom

graphs.instruction: Organize the bedroom. Put the vase, book, and clock on the chest of drawers. I prefer to have the vase, book, and clock neatly arranged on the chest of drawers for a tidy look.

nodes.description: keep toy airplane next to the couch for easy access while relaxing

nodes.name: couch
nodes.expression: next to the couch in the living room

graphs.instruction: Move the toy airplane from the bedroom to the living room table. Place it next to the couch. I like to keep the toy airplane next to the couch so I can easily play with it while relaxing.

nodes.description: place the vase on the shelves and the candle on the table to create a cozy atmosphere

graphs.instruction: Place the vase on the shelves, the candle on the table. I prefer to have the vase on the shelves and the candle on the table to create a cozy atmosphere in the room.

nodes.description: keep laptop and mouse pad on the kitchen counter for morning work sessions

nodes.name: bedroom_table
nodes.expression: on the table in the bedroom

nodes.name: kitchen_counter
nodes.expression: on the counter in the kitchen

graphs.instruction: Move the laptop and mouse pad from the table in the bedroom to the counter in the kitchen. Place them next to each other on the counter. I like to keep my laptop and mouse pad on the kitchen counter for morning work sessions.

nodes.description: have the jug, cup, and plate ready on the living room table for afternoon tea time

graphs.instruction: Move the jug, cup, and plate to the living room table. I always like to have the jug, cup, and plate ready on the living room table for my afternoon tea time.

nodes.description: start the day by having the picture frame and clock together in the kitchen

nodes.name: bedroom_table
nodes.expression: on the table in the bedroom

nodes.name: kitchen_counter
nodes.expression: on the counter in the kitchen

graphs.instruction: Move the picture frame and clock to the table in the bedroom. Then, place them next to each other on the counter in the kitchen. I usually like to start my day by having the picture frame and clock together in the kitchen.

nodes.description: keep book and clock together on the bedroom chair for easy access before bed

graphs.instruction: Move the book and clock from the living room shelves to the bedroom chair. Place them next to each other on the chair. I prefer to have my book and clock together on the bedroom chair for easy access before bed.

nodes.description: keep bread, potato, and egg together on the kitchen table for breakfast

graphs.instruction: Place the bread, the potato, and the egg on the kitchen table and place them next to each other. Almost everyday I these items together on the kitchen table for my breakfast.

nodes.description: keep statue and picture frame next to each other on the shelves in the bedroom to maintain a cohesive decor

nodes.name: table
nodes.expression: on the table in the living room

nodes.name: shelves
nodes.expression: on the shelves in the bedroom

graphs.instruction: Move the statue and picture frame from the table in the living room to the shelves in the bedroom. Place them next to each other on the shelves. I prefer to keep the statue and picture frame on the shelves in the bedroom to maintain a cohesive decor.

nodes.description: keep candle and vase together on the bathroom toilet for a calming atmosphere

graphs.instruction: First, move the candle and then the vase from the living room shelves to the bathroom toilet. Place them next to each other on the toilet. I typically keep the candle and vase together on the bathroom toilet for a calming atmosphere.

nodes.description: keep laptop and mouse pad on the living room table for work, and clock on a different shelf to track time without clutter

graphs.instruction: Move the laptop and the mouse pad to a new living room table. Move the clock to another shelf. I prefer to have my laptop and mouse pad on the living room table for work, and the clock on a different shelf to keep track of time without cluttering my workspace.

nodes.description: keep study materials together on the bedroom shelves for easy access when working or studying

nodes.name: table
nodes.expression: on the table in the living room

nodes.name: shelves
nodes.expression: on the shelves in the bedroom

graphs.instruction: Take the book, pencil case, and multiport hub from the table in the living room and put them on the shelves in the bedroom, placing them next to each other. I like to keep my study materials together on the bedroom shelves for easy access when I'm working or studying in my room.

nodes.description: move laptop and stand to bedroom chair for work, keep book on living room table for quick access during breaks

graphs.instruction: Move the laptop and laptop stand from the living room table to the bedroom chair. Also, bring a book from the bedroom chair to the living room table. I usually move my laptop and stand to the bedroom chair when I'm ready for work and keep a book on the living room table for quick access during breaks.

nodes.description: beige statue on a black base

graphs.instruction: Move the statue and picture frame from the table in the living room to the shelves in the bedroom. Place them next to each other on the shelves. The statue is beige on a black base, and the picture frame is silver with an ornate border. The statue is a keepsake from my travels.

nodes.description: keep kettle and keychain together in the bedroom for convenience in the morning

nodes.name: bedroom_filing_cabinet
nodes.expression: on the filing cabinet in the bedroom

graphs.instruction: Move the kettle and keychain from the kitchen cabinet to the bedroom filing cabinet. Place them next to each other on the filing cabinet. I like to keep my kettle and keychain together in the bedroom for convenience in the morning.

nodes.description: keep vase, lamp, and plate together on the couch in the living room after rearranging from the table

nodes.name: table
nodes.expression: on the table in the living room

nodes.name: couch
nodes.expression: on the couch in the living room

graphs.instruction: Move the vase, then the lamp, and finally the plate to the table in the living room. Then, move them to the couch in the living room and place them next to each other. I prefer to keep the vase, lamp, and plate together on the couch in the living room after rearranging them from the table.
